ygData.subject: Disable DNS-Lookup for URI's not in scope
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, is there an easy way to disable the DNS lookup for URI s which are not in the scope? Can this be done with a decide rule or is there maybe already a

Subject: Disable DNS-Lookup for URI's not in scope

From: "Markus.Mirsberger" <markus.mirsberger@...>

Hi,

is there an easy way to disable the DNS lookup for URI's which are not 
in the scope? Can this be done with a decide rule or is there maybe 
already a switch?
I am using a seeds file with surts and I only want crawl these Urls and 
also only want a DNS Lookup for the hosts in this scope.

My problem is that I have two domains with identical webserver setup on 
the same machine. One has alot of external Links and one not.
The domain without many external Links can be crawled with about 
50Urls/sec and the other one just with 0.5Urls/sec
Thats why I think the DNS-Lookup of the outgoing links might cause the 
speed issue.

Cheers,
Markus
